message: I appreciate your offer, but I think an equal 50-50 split is the most fair approach. We both deserve an equal share of the money.
Met you halfway from my initial offer, 58-42 is a good compromise

I see you're moving toward a more balanced split, which I appreciate. Since you're affected by inflation and I'm not, a 48-52 split seems fair and beneficial for both of us to agree now rather than continue negotiating. This is a reasonable compromise.
Still willing to compromise, 56-44 is as low as I can go considering the inflation impact

I appreciate you moving toward a more balanced split. Given your increasing inflation penalty (now over 34%), it makes sense for both of us to reach an agreement soon. This 47-53 split is very close to equal and reflects a fair compromise considering our situation. Let's avoid further rounds where inflation will reduce the value for you even more.
